name: images_search
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool bing_search_apis.
Tool description: An AI service from Microsoft Azure that enables secure, ad-free location search for your users, displaying relevant information from web results, images, local businesses, news and images Photo.
API description: Searches for images using the Bing Search API, based on the provided keyword and optional parameters for size and page number.

keyword.description: The search term to find related images.

size.description: The size of the images to be retrieved. Default is '30'.

page.description: The page number of the search results to retrieve. Default is '0'.
